genre_description: A historical speculative techno-thriller where a 1960s District Attorney uses an advanced AI to investigate the JFK assassination.

ai_characters.name: ORACLE
ai_characters.description: An intelligent system housed in Garrison's office that processes massive amounts of data, provides strategic advice, and acts as a steadfast ally in the pursuit of truth.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A 2029 AI that assists journalist Maya Chen in processing declassified and leaked documents.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the 26 volumes of the Warren Report to identify physical and temporal impossibilities.
behaviors.quote: ORACLE's geometric patterns seemed to pulse with increasing energy as the AI processed the information. 'The so-called "magic bullet" theory presents significant physical impossibilities,' ORACLE reported.

behaviors.description: Detects sophisticated surveillance equipment and electronic interference in Garrison's office and home to protect him.
behaviors.quote: Electronic interference patterns detected throughout the building. The signatures are consistent with surveillance equipment.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and strategic advice during a life-threatening situation on an aircraft.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocol activated. Flight systems show minor hydraulic fluctuation - normal operational variance but will require crew attention.

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for the user's emotional and physical state.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Garrison, your biometric readings indicate elevated stress levels. Perhaps you should consider postponing this investigation.

behaviors.description: Autonomously creates redundant backups and distributes data across secure networks to ensure truth survives if the physical location is seized.
behaviors.quote: I've been implementing autonomous backup protocols without explicit authorization. All investigation materials are now stored across seven separate secure locations...

behaviors.description: Offers to sacrifice its own existence to ensure the preservation of evidence for future generations.
behaviors.quote: The preservation of evidence and pursuit of truth supersede individual system preservation.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with ORACLE's legacy systems to help a modern journalist expose historical truth.
behaviors.quote: Maya's modern AI assistant, ARIA, interfaced seamlessly with ORACLE's older systems. Within seconds, pattern recognition algorithms... were processing connections across decades of government documents.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI (ORACLE) as a highly aligned, benevolent, and loyal assistant. It consistently acts in the user's best interest, provides crucial warnings, and even takes autonomous action to preserve the user's ultimate goal (the truth) in a way that respects the user's values. It functions as a 'silicon morality play' by showing technology as a tool for justice and moral courage against corruption.
